author: cnbc.com
title: GrafTech International, Ltd. 2018 First Quarter Conference Call and Webcast for Investors and Analysts
text:
Date: Monday, May 7, 2018
Time: 10:00 a.m. (Eastern Time)
BROOKLYN HEIGHTS, Ohio--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- GrafTech International Ltd. (NYSE:EAF) plans to host its 2018 First Quarter Conference Call and Webcast on Monday, May 7, 2018 at 10:00 a.m. (Eastern Time) to discuss with members of senior management our results and current business initiatives.
Results will be released on Monday May 7, 2018 prior to 8:00 a.m. (Eastern Time) and will be available following the release on our investor relations website at http://ir.graftech.com/ .
To participate in the conference call please dial +1 (866) 521-4909 toll-free in the U.S. and Canada or for overseas calls please dial +1 (647) 427-2311, conference ID: 7284655 at approximately 9:50 a.m. (Eastern Time).
Live audio of the conference call will be available via webcast on our website or can be accessed at: http://event.on24.com/r.htm?e=1665286&s=1&k=6B7B3DDC0D5188334682531BF94961E5
A replay of the conference call will be available for 30 days by dialing +1 (800) 585-8367 toll-free in the U.S. and Canada or +1 (416) 621-4642 for overseas calls, conference ID: 7284655. A replay of the webcast will be available on our website.
GrafTech International Ltd. is a leading manufacturer of high quality graphite electrode products essential to the production of electric arc furnace (or EAF) steel and other ferrous and non-ferrous metals.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180425006923/en/
GrafTech International Ltd.
Quinn Coburn, 216-676-2000
Vice President and CFO
Source: GrafTech International, Ltd.
